document.heading: Omnibus Sports Consolidation Amendment Act of 1998

history.narrative: Law 12-115, the “Omnibus Sports Consolidation Amendment Act of 1998,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 12-417. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on February 3, 1998, and March 3, 1998, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on March 17, 1998, it was assigned Act No. 12-312 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 12-115 became effective on June 6, 1998.
